page.title: 13LEISURE FACILITIES IN WOTTON
page.content: The countryside around Wotton is dominated by the Cotswold Hills. These provide an ideal environment for outdoor leisure. {COTSWOLD WAY}This runs from Bath in the south to Chipping Campden in the north. A distance of 46 miles. The route takes it through the centre of Wotton. {CANNON'S COURT FARM}This is a popular internationally known camping and caravanning site. {COTSWOLD EDGE GOLF COURSE}Newly opened in 1980 situated on the top of the escarpment with splendid views of the Severn Vale and river. {KATHARINE LADY BERKELEY'S SCHOOL}has a well equipped Sports Hall open for public use after school.Sports include Badminton, Squash, Soccer and Table tennis.
